Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Pair of earrings
Description: This is a pair of earrings made from a copper wire, curved in order to create a circle. The circumference of the first earring is almost complete (only a small opening of 4 mm) and the extremities are sharp. The cross-section of the earring is round and, before oxidation, could have been 1 mm thick at the extremities. The second earring is broken and its current shape is only a half circle.
